item.title: Oxford-1820 v1.4.0.4
item.description:
Product: Oxford-1820 v1.4.0.4
Company: Levylab
Release Date: Thu, 15 May 2025 13:44:33 -0400
Packager: Patrick Irvin

Description: VIs for controlling the Oxford 18/20 magnet

Release Notes: [1.4.0]
- #16: Instrument Framework v1.15.1
- #12: Backend changes move hardware calls to Instrument.Oxford1820.lvclass:process.vi
- #13: cryogen level graph elements
- #14: Instrument Framework #91: updated API commands and data names
- Mercury drivers are included as Mercury-iXX package dependency
item.dc:creator: Levylab

item.title: Cryostation v1.3.0.6
item.description:
Product: Cryostation v1.3.0.6
Company: LevyLab
Release Date: Thu, 15 May 2025 08:16:48 -0400
Packager: Patrick Irvin

Description: Program for logging Montana Instruments Cryostation status to the SQL DB. Provides a UI and API for getting information from the Cryostation.

Release Notes: - Update to Instrument Framework v1.15.1

item.title: Oxford-VRM v1.8.0.12
item.description:
Product: Oxford-VRM v1.8.0.12
Company: Levylab
Release Date: Tue, 06 May 2025 10:18:22 -0400
Packager: Patrick Irvin

Description: VIs for controlling the Oxford VRM PS that controls the CF900's 3D magnet

Release Notes: [1.8.0]
- build 64 bit exe
- #6 move hardware control into child process
- #11 Instrument Framework 1.15 / SMO 1.4
item.dc:creator: Levylab

item.title: Multichannel Lockin v2.20.1.10
item.description:
Product: Multichannel Lockin v2.20.1.10
Company: LevyLab
Release Date: Tue, 06 May 2025 10:18:21 -0400
Packager: Patrick Irvin

Description: Multichannel Lockin for National Instruments' Dynamic Signal Acquisition hardware (4431, 4461, 4462).
- This version is configured to handle multiple cards for simultaneous, synchronized AI/AO.
- The analog outputs can be configured to output sine, square, sawtooth, or triangle functions with (swept) DC offsets.
- Each of the analog inputs can be demodulated at multiple frequencies.

Release Notes: [2.20.1]
Issues:
- #96: change to Instrument Framework 1.15 / SMO 1.4

#### Dependencies
- Please ensure that [Visual C++ Redistributable Packages for Visual Studio 2013](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=40784) is installed. The bitness must match the application you're targeting.
item.dc:creator: LevyLab

item.title: Sweep Control v1.1.0.10
item.description:
Product: Sweep Control v1.1.0.10
Company: Levylab
Release Date: Tue, 06 May 2025 06:28:06 -0400
Packager: Patrick Irvin

Description: [SweepControl.lvclass]
- Sweep Control.vi:
- Sequencer for stepping multiple parameters. Calls VIs in Transport.lvclass
- Continuous B sweep.vi:
- Sweep B continuously while asynchronously calling VIs in Transport.lvclass

Release Notes: [1.2.0]
- - #93/#94: Updates related to Instrument Framework
item.dc:creator: Levylab

item.title: Transport v1.9.0.11
item.description:
Product: Transport v1.9.0.11
Company: Levylab
Release Date: Mon, 05 May 2025 20:25:05 -0400
Packager: Patrick Irvin

Description: VIs for scripting and performing transport measurments.

[Transport.lvclass]
Basic transport measurments:
- Lockin vs time (Lockin_time.vi)
- Lockin Sweep Mode (Lockin_sweep.vi)

Release Notes: [1.9.0]
- #93/#94: Updates related to Instrument Framework
